descripcion: Running faster just got easier. More responsive than its award-winning predecessor, the Deviate NITRO 2 features a full-length layer of premium NITRO Elite foam at the midsole for supreme cushioning and peak propulsion. A reworked PWRPLATE—with an innovative platform design—acts as a lever for maximum energy transfer at toe-off, while the breathable mesh upper offers extra padding and grip around the ankle to prevent heel slip. Improved traction rounds out this tech-packed running shoe that thrives at any distance. The striking gradient colorway checks the style box. Effortless has never felt—or looked—better.

Pay tribute to a legend in this gold edition Clyde. Inspired by the legend himself, we created the PUMA Clyde back in 1973 just for basketball icon Walt "Clyde Frazier". Known for his on-court playstyle and off-court street style, the Clyde is all class and flash. This version is updated with gold foil branding and a premium leather upper.

ULTRA – Just when they think you couldn’t get any faster – you do. With its fully reengineered, lightweight ULTRAWEAVE upper, the new ULTRA ULTIMATE takes its signature speed and acceleration to the next level. The application of PWRTAPE draws from the anatomy of the human foot to provide natural support for quick changes of pace and direction. Running spike-inspired SPEEDPLATE makes it official: ULTRA is Too Fast for Them.

  • ULTRAWEAVE: Ultra-light, engineered fabric with a structured, 4-way stretch that reduces weight and friction
  • PWRTAPE: Targeted upper reinforcement for support and durability
  • The upper of this shoe is made with at least 20% recycled materials as a step toward a better future
  • ULTRAWEAVE upper material
  • Lightweight removable sockliner with NanoGrip technology keeps the foot from slipping inside the boot
  • Dual-density SPEEDPLATE outsole is inspired by PUMA track running spikes for next-level traction and propulsion
  • Lightweight Dynamic Motion System outsole enhances traction and agility for unpredictable changes of pace and direction. Suitable for use on both firm natural surfaces and artificial grass (4G).
  • Regular to narrow fit
  • FG/AG: Firm Ground/Artificial Ground
modelo: ULTRA ULTIMATE FG/AG Men's Soccer Cleats

This season, we welcome CIELE to the Run PUMA roster to celebrate the culture of running. The PUMA x CIELE collection is timeless in its appearance, yet modern – and almost ahead of its time – in the way it performs on a run. There's no better proof than this version of the Deviate NITRO™ 2. It’s the max cushion, max performance running shoe that makes going faster even easier. The update includes NITROFOAM™ Elite for improved responsiveness, a reworked collar to reduce heel slip, and a lighter, asymmetrical base that works better with your body across all distances – be it short runs, marathons, or even ultras.

Tackle any terrain in the sturdy confines of the Voyage NITRO™ 3. In this updated version of the model, we’ve tooled the trail shoe with a full NITROFOAM™ midsole for a lighter weight and more responsive ride when you’re conquering distances. The PUMAGRIP ATR rubber outsole has been revamped with our PWRADAPT tech, allowing the lugs to move independently with the ground for supreme traction on multi-terrain. Our new, wider upper has been reinforced with PWRTAPE for support and protection, and the forefoot drain ports shed water like a champ. Dominate your run, no matter the season, with the Voyage NITRO™ 3.

The ForeverRUN NITRO dawns a new era of support and guidance for all runners, providing the softness of a full NITRO midsole without compromising stability. It features a newly developed NITRO midsole with two different densities – a softer core with a firmer rim – and an asymmetrical heel counter to hold the foot in place through every stride. The theme also continues on the outsole, thanks to a wider medial rubber segment stabilising late-stage pronation. In short, it's the perfect blend of support and cushion.

descripcion: Step into these sneakers and add instant style to your look.

Control never felt this comfortable. An icon that spans generations, the KING is back with bold design upgrades and innovative materials that work better – for the player and for the planet. Like the all-new K-BETTER upper material, made with 60% recycled content to reduce environmental impact while improving the signature touch, comfort, and stretch resistance. The new lightweight outsole features an external heel counter, integrated stability spine, and conical studs, so you have as much control over your movement as you do over the ball.

An all-in-one neutral running shoe for any distance and any weather, the Velocity NITRO™ 2 GORE-TEX® is a lightweight and sleek update to the Run PUMA roster. Featuring a waterproof GORE-TEX® upper and NITROFOAM™ for exceptional responsiveness and ultimate cushioning, this upgrade to the original is a well-fitting and durable shoe for a smooth ride. PUMAGRIP offers multi-surface traction, from treadmill to track.

We’ve revamped the breathable mesh upper with a futuristic look and retooled the rest of the shoe with a rolled collar, built-in heel lock, and a special ‘cat’s’ tongue to secure the heel for every run.

descripcion: Running faster just got easier. More responsive than its award-winning predecessor, the Deviate NITRO 2 features a full-length layer of premium NITRO Elite foam at the midsole for supreme cushioning and peak propulsion. A reworked PWRPLATE—with an innovative platform design—acts as a lever for maximum energy transfer at toe-off, while the breathable mesh upper offers extra padding and grip around the ankle to prevent heel slip. Improved traction rounds out this tech-packed running shoe that thrives at any distance. The striking gradient colorway checks the style box. Effortless has never felt—or looked—better.

An all-in-one neutral running shoe for any distance, the Velocity Nitro 2 is a lightweight and sleek update to the Run PUMA roster. Featuring NITRO foam for exceptional responsiveness and ultimate cushioning, this upgrade to the original is a well-fitting and durable shoe for a smooth ride. Built for comfort at whatever speed, the versatile runner also provides enhanced visibility through reflective accents, so you can hit your stride on your time. PUMAGRIP offers multi-surface traction, from treadmill to track.

Tackle any terrain in the sturdy confines of the Voyage NITRO™ 3. In this updated version of the model, we’ve tooled the trail shoe with a full NITROFOAM™ midsole for a lighter weight and more responsive ride when you’re conquering distances. The PUMAGRIP ATR rubber outsole has been revamped with our PWRADAPT tech, allowing the lugs to move independently with the ground for supreme traction on multi-terrain. Our new, wider upper has been reinforced with PWRTAPE for support and protection, and the forefoot drain ports shed water like a champ. Dominate your run, no matter the season, with the Voyage NITRO™ 3.
  • The upper of this shoe is made with at least 30% recycled materials as a step toward a better future.
  • NITRO™: Advanced foam technology providing superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package.
  • PUMAGRIP ATR: Trail-ready performance rubber compound designed for traction on ice, mud, and unstable surfaces
  • PWRADAPT: Allows the lugs to move independently with the ground for best traction on multi-terrain and in multiple weather conditions
  • Breathable mono mesh upper with PWRTAPE reinforcements
  • Adaptive fit system offering a secure lockdown through the midfoot
  • Forefoot drain ports
  • NITROFOAM™ midsole
  • Lateral flares in the midfoot for improved ankle support
  • PUMAGRIP ATR outsole with PWRADAPT lugs for multi-terrain and multi-weather support
  • Cushioning level: Max
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Heel-to-toe drop: 6mm
modelo: SEASONS Voyage NITRO™ 3 Men's Running Shoes

descripcion:
This season, we welcome CIELE to the Run PUMA roster to celebrate the culture of running. The PUMA x CIELE collection is timeless in its appearance, yet modern – and almost ahead of its time – in the way it performs on a run. And the Fast-R NITRO™ Elite is a perfect example. The cutting-edge, two-part midsole features NITROFOAM™ Elite for supreme responsiveness and PWRPLATE technology to ensure maximum running efficiency and stability. The marathon-worthy racing shoe offers a sock-like fit with a lightweight mono-mesh upper and targeted PWRTAPE reinforcement for added durability and support. The cushioned heel works with a reactive forefoot for peak propulsion, while PUMAGRIP provides multi-surface traction without added bulk. Travel at the speed of lightweight with PUMA and CIELE.
  • NITROFOAM™ Elite: Premium performance foam technology that provides pinnacle responsiveness in an extremely lightweight package
  • PWRTAPE: Targeted upper reinforcement for support and durability
  • PWRPLATE: Carbon fibre plate engineered to stabilise the midsole while maximising energy transfer
  • PUMAGRIP-LT: Lightweight, high traction rubber compound designed for the ultimate race-day performance
  • Sock-like fit
  • Lightweight mono-mesh upper
  • Heel fin
  • Cushioning level: Max
  • Heel-to-toe drop: 0mm
  • Best for: Neutral pronators
  • Runner type: Competitive

descripcion: An all-in-one neutral running shoe for any distance, the Velocity Nitro 2 is a lightweight and sleek update to the Run PUMA roster. Featuring NITRO foam for exceptional responsiveness and ultimate cushioning, this upgrade to the original is a well-fitting and durable shoe for a smooth ride. Built for comfort at whatever speed, the versatile runner also provides enhanced visibility through reflective accents, so you can hit your stride on your time. PUMAGRIP offers multi-surface traction, from treadmill to track.

descripcion:
Tackle any terrain in the sturdy confines of the Voyage NITRO™ 3. In this updated version of the model, we’ve tooled the trail shoe with a full NITROFOAM™ midsole for a lighter weight and more responsive ride when you’re conquering distances. The PUMAGRIP ATR rubber outsole has been revamped with our PWRADAPT tech, allowing the lugs to move independently with the ground for supreme traction on multi-terrain. Our new, wider upper has been reinforced with PWRTAPE for support and protection, and the forefoot drain ports shed water like a champ. Dominate your run, no matter the season, with the Voyage NITRO™ 3.
  • The upper of this shoe is made with at least 30% recycled materials as a step toward a better future.
  • NITRO™: Advanced foam technology providing superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package.
  • PUMAGRIP ATR: Trail-ready performance rubber compound designed for traction on ice, mud, and unstable surfaces
  • PWRADAPT: Allows the lugs to move independently with the ground for best traction on multi-terrain and in multiple weather conditions
  • Breathable mono mesh upper with PWRTAPE reinforcements
  • Adaptive fit system offering a secure lockdown through the midfoot
  • Forefoot drain ports
  • NITROFOAM™ midsole

The Suede hit the scene in 1968 and has been changing the game ever since. It’s been worn by the icons of every generation and it’s stayed classic through it all. This year, we relaunch the Suede with fresh colorways and subtle design updates for the next generation of icons. Classic as ever.

The perfect choice for runners just starting out, the Electrify NITRO 2 delivers the cushioning and reliability needed your daily jog. The dual midsole contains our lightweight, nitrogen-injected NITRO foam in the heel alongside our sturdier PROFOAMLITE throughout the rest of the midsole, allowing for an airy, cushioned ride. We’ve revamped the breathable mesh upper with a futuristic look and retooled the rest of the shoe with a rolled collar, built-in heel lock, and a special ‘cat’s’ tongue to secure the heel for every run.
modelo: Electrify NITRO™ 2 Big Kids' Running Shoes

descripcion: An all-in-one neutral running shoe for any distance, the Velocity Nitro 2 is a lightweight and sleek update to the Run PUMA roster. Featuring NITRO foam for exceptional responsiveness and ultimate cushioning, this upgrade to the original is a well-fitting and durable shoe for a smooth ride. Built for comfort at whatever speed, the versatile runner also provides enhanced visibility through reflective accents, so you can hit your stride on your time. PUMAGRIP offers multi-surface traction, from treadmill to track.
modelo: Velocity NITRO™ 2 Big Kids' Running Shoes

descripcion:
The next generation of innovation, built for the fastest times over a short distance: the Fast-FWD NITRO™ Elite. It puts ground-breaking engineering at the forefront, with a cut-away NITROFOAM™ Elite midsole and a responsive PWRPLATE combining to get you running a PB every single time. Add in a comfortable sock-like upper and you have yourself a race winner – just make sure to note your time on the midsole.
  • NITRO™ Elite: Premium performance foam technology that provides pinnacle responsiveness in an extremely lightweight package
  • PWRPLATE: Carbon fibre plate engineered to stabilise the midsole while maximising energy transfer
  • PWRTAPE: Targeted upper reinforcement for support and durability
  • PUMAGRIP-LT: Lightweight, high traction rubber compound designed for the ultimate race-day performance
  • Sock-like fit
  • Breathable mono-mesh upper with 3D printed support
  • Undercut heel and forefoot
  • Heel fin
  • Cushioning level: Low
  • Heel-to-toe drop: 0mm
  • Best for: Neutral pronators
  • Runner type: Competitive

The perfect choice for young runners, the Electrify NITRO™ 3 running shoe offers a progressive design, delivering cushioning and reliability for your daily jog. In a redesign of the previous models, this dual midsole has more NITROFOAM™ in the heel and durable PROFOAMLITE throughout the rest of the midsole. The result is better responsiveness and ride under the foot, for a shoe that's always airy and cushioned. We’ve revamped the breathable mesh upper with a futuristic look and retooled the rest of the shoe with a rolled collar and a heel that will hug your foot. New female runners looking for good value: this is your shoe.
  • NITRO™: Advanced nitrogen-injected foam designed to provide superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package
  • PROFOAMLITE: Extremely lightweight EVA designed to cushion your landing and propel each step
  • PUMAGRIP: Durable performance rubber compound designed for all-surface traction
  • Engineered mesh upper
  • TPU heel spoiler
  • Heel fit: rolled collar to keep the heel secure and comfortable
  • Cushioning level: Medium
  • PUMA Formstrip on the lateral side
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Heel-to-toe drop: 8mm

descripcion:
The ForeverRUN NITRO™ for women dawns a new era of support and guidance for all runners, providing the softness of a full NITROFOAM™ midsole without compromising stability. It features a newly developed NITROFOAM™ midsole with two different densities – a softer core with a firmer rim – and an asymmetrical heel counter to hold the foot in place through every stride. The theme also continues on the outsole, with a wider medial rubber segment that stabilises late-stage pronation. In short, it's the perfect blend of support and cushion.
  • NITRO™: Advanced nitrogen-infused foam designed to provide superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package
  • PWRTAPE: Targeted upper reinforcement for support and durability
  • RUNGUIDE: Firm density guide rail designed to keep your foot aligned and centred through each stride
  • PUMAGRIP: Durable performance rubber compound designed for all-surface traction
  • Engineered mesh upper
  • Moulded heel technology
  • Flared rubber outsole
  • Cushioning level: Max
  • Shoe pronation: Overpronation
  • Heel-to-toe drop: 0mm

We Are Legends is PUMA’s platform celebrating Black excellence in design and fashion – and empowering a new era of Black designers. This seasons's WAL collection illustrates the legendary celebration of Carnival, through the lens of the African Diaspora, to amplify the message of Black joy around the world. The Orkid Women's Sneakers is a celebration of that creative expression.
modelo: WAL Mas Camp Orkid Women's Sneakers

descripcion:
The lightweight running shoe that will do it all, no matter the terrain – the Fast-Trac NITRO™ 2 has dropped. It delivers a smooth ride and ground-feel on surfaces including including loose trails and gravel, thanks to a full-length nitrogen-infused top layer embedded in the PROFOAMLITE midsole. Add to that the durable PUMAGRIP-ATR outsole and integrated eyestays for a snug fit, along with details at the toe that help drain humidity and protect from debris – and you're golden with this ground-breaking shoe made for all runners in all four seasons.
  • NITRO™: Enclosed nitrogen-injected foam designed to provide responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package
  • PROFOAMLITE: Extremely lightweight EVA designed to cushion your landing and propel each step
  • PUMAGRIP ATR: Trail-ready performance rubber compound designed for traction on ice, mud, and unstable surfaces
  • Ripstop mesh upper
  • Forefoot drainage ports and debris protectors
  • Cushioning level: Medium
  • PUMA Formstrip on the lateral side
  • Heel-to-toe drop: 6mm
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
modelo: SEASONS Fast-Trac NITRO™ 2 Men's Running Shoes

descripcion: We worked with professional athletes to amplify three key training attributes—stability, fit, and traction. The FUSE 2.0 features increased rubber for enhanced stability, including higher sidewall coverage to ensure traction and grip. The streamlined upper construction provides durability for rope climbs, while a lightweight TPU heel clip is designed for handstand push-ups. And all this innovation comes in one sleek package to help you reach your ultimate training potential.

Control has never been so comfortable. An icon that has stood the test of time for several generations, the KING returns armed with an eye-catching design and innovative materials that benefit both the player and the planet. This includes the brand new K-BETTER™ upper, which reduces environmental impact with recycled content while delivering signature feel, comfort and stretch. The lightweight outsole with external heel counter, stabilising tread and tapered studs gives you full freedom of movement to keep you in control of the ball.
  • The upper of this shoe is made with at least 20% recycled materials and the bottom is made with at least 10% recycled materials, as a step toward a better future.
  • K-BETTER. Made with 60% recycled nylon from post-industrial waste, this new, non-animal based upper material takes the signature touch, comfort, and stretch resistance to the next level. The signature KING touch. Only better.
  • Lightweight outsole with external heel counter for maximum maneuverability.
  • Knitted low-cut slip-on construction ensures a comfortable fit.
  • Lightweight removable sockliner with NanoGrip technology keeps the foot from slipping inside the cleat.
  • FG/AG: Designed for Firm Ground/Artifical Ground
modelo: KING ULTIMATE ENERGY FG/AG Men's Soccer Cleats

Modelled after the high-tech racing shoes worn by driver George Russel and with design inspiration from PUMA's 75 year anniversary, this limited-edition Speedcat Pro is all about showcasing the marque’s precision engineering. For starters, the model merges comfort, grip, and safety in a low profile silhouette. From a more technical standpoint, it features an ultra-lightweight fabric upper with a carbon fibre support counter to keep your feet in racing position. The EVA wedge and rubber outsole ensure the ultimate grip as you hit the pedal. Of course, the hallmark of the racing shoe is the iconic Mercedes-AMG PETRONAS emblem. What's more is that you get the exact same shoe as your favorite driver, meaning it only comes in their size.
  • Low boot
  • Laces closure
  • Rubber outsole
  • Mercedes-AMG PETRONAS branding
  • Size 11.5
modelo: Mercedes-AMG PETRONAS Speedcat Pro George Russell PUMA 75th Year Anniversary Celebration Men's Driving Shoes

From a more technical standpoint, it features an ultra-lightweight fabric upper with a carbon fibre support counter to keep your feet in racing position. The EVA wedge and rubber outsole ensure the ultimate grip as you hit the pedal. Of course, the hallmark of the racing shoe is the iconic Ferrari shield emblazoned on the Rosso Corsa and black. Even more, this sneaker is only available in Carlos Sainz's actual foot size of 8.5. Forza Ferrari!

descripcion:
Tackle any terrain in the sturdy confines of the Voyage NITRO™ 3. In this updated version of the model, we’ve tooled the trail shoe with a full NITROFOAM™ midsole for a lighter weight and more responsive ride when you’re conquering distances. The PUMAGRIP ATR rubber outsole has been revamped with our PWRADAPT tech, allowing the lugs to move independently with the ground for supreme traction on multi-terrain. Our new, wider upper has been reinforced with PWRTAPE for support and protection, and the forefoot drain ports shed water like a champ. Dominate your run, no matter the season, with the Voyage NITRO™ 3.
  • The upper of this shoe is made with at least 30% recycled materials as a step toward a better future.
  • NITRO™: Advanced foam technology providing superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package.
  • PUMAGRIP ATR: Trail-ready performance rubber compound designed for traction on ice, mud, and unstable surfaces
  • PWRADAPT: Allows the lugs to move independently with the ground for best traction on multi-terrain and in multiple weather conditions

descripcion:
This season, we welcome CIELE to the Run PUMA roster to celebrate the culture of running. The PUMA x CIELE collection is timeless in its appearance, yet modern – and almost ahead of its time – in the way it performs on a run. There's no better proof than this version of the Deviate NITRO™ 2. It’s the max cushion, max performance running shoe that makes going faster even easier. The update includes NITROFOAM™ Elite for improved responsiveness, a reworked collar to reduce heel slip, and a lighter, asymmetrical base that works better with your body across all distances – be it short runs, marathons, or even ultras.
  • NITROFOAM™ Elite: Premium performance foam technology that provides pinnacle responsiveness in an extremely lightweight package
  • PWRPLATE: Innovative carbon composite plate designed for maximum energy transfer and optimised running efficiency
  • PWRTAPE: Targeted upper reinforcement for support and durability
  • PUMAGRIP: Durable performance rubber compound designed for all-surface traction
  • Breathable engineered mesh upper
  • Reflective design elements
  • TPU heel spoiler
  • Cushioning level: Max
  • Heel-to-toe drop: 6mm
  • Best for: Neutral pronators
  • Runner type: Frequent
modelo: PUMA x CIELE Deviate NITRO™ 2 Women's Running Shoes

Tackle any terrain in the sturdy confines of the Voyage NITRO™ 3. In this updated version of the model, we’ve tooled the trail shoe with a full NITROFOAM™ midsole for a lighter weight and more responsive ride when you’re conquering distances. The PUMAGRIP ATR rubber outsole has been revamped with our PWRADAPT tech, allowing the lugs to move independently with the ground for supreme traction on multi-terrain. Our new, wider upper has been reinforced with PWRTAPE for support and protection, and the forefoot drain ports shed water like a champ. Dominate your run, no matter the season, with the Voyage NITRO™ 3.
  • The upper of this shoe is made with at least 30% recycled materials as a step toward a better future.
  • NITRO™: Advanced foam technology providing superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package.
  • PUMAGRIP ATR: Trail-ready performance rubber compound designed for traction on ice, mud, and unstable surfaces
  • PWRADAPT: Allows the lugs to move independently with the ground for best traction on multi-terrain and in multiple weather conditions
  • Breathable mono mesh upper with PWRTAPE reinforcements
  • Adaptive fit system offering a secure lockdown through the midfoot
  • Forefoot drain ports

The internal compound is single density NITROFOAM™ to allow for rebounding and cushioning. With PWR NITRO™ Squared, you'll receive not only world-class comfort and stability during your next high intensity gym session, but it's also an eye-catching addition to your workout wardrobe.

It has a FUZIONFIT360 upper with PWRTAPE support that locks you in for quick cuts and changes of pace. Calling all PR-chasers. Set a new personal best at your next marathon in the Deviate NITRO Elite 2 racing shoes. Pinnacle responsiveness, propulsion, and cushioning in an extremely lightweight package (60g lighter than our previous Deviate model), this shoe exceeds the demands of runners chasing a best time in competitions. We’ve accomplished this through a thinner rubber, an even lighter nitrogen-injected NITRO Elite foam midsole, a leaner and stronger, thermo-formed carbon fibre plate, and a filmy upper that maximizes both breathability and lockdown. Now, take your mark.
modelo: Deviate NITRO™ Elite 2 Women's Running Shoes

Calling all playmakers. Inspired by Neymar Jr’s style of play, the new FUTURE ULTIMATE is here so you can Drive Them Crazy. It has a FUZIONFIT360 upper with PWRTAPE support that locks you in for quick cuts and changes of pace. Dynamic Motion System provides more support at the heel, more flexibility at the forefoot, and more traction in every direction. The upper is textured with different levels of grip for dribbling, passing, and finishing, so you can make every play count.

descripcion: We worked with professional athletes to amplify three key training attributes—stability, fit, and traction. The FUSE 2.0 features increased rubber for enhanced stability, including higher sidewall coverage to ensure traction and grip. The streamlined upper construction provides durability for rope climbs, while a lightweight TPU heel clip is designed for handstand push-ups. And all this innovation comes in one sleek package to help you reach your ultimate training potential.

Introducing the latest high-performance training shoe from the TRAIN PUMA squad, the PWR NITRO™ Squared. This universal training shoe features our brand-new NITRO™ Squared technology, which is executed with a dual density nitrogen-injected outer to provide enhanced midsole banking during lateral movements. The internal compound is single density NITROFOAM™ to allow for rebounding and cushioning. With PWR NITRO™ Squared, you'll receive not only world-class comfort and stability during your next high intensity gym session, but it's also an eye-catching addition to your workout wardrobe.
  • NITROFOAM™: Advanced nitrogen-injected foam designed to provide superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package

The ForeverRUN NITRO™ for women dawns a new era of support and guidance for all runners, providing the softness of a full NITROFOAM™ midsole without compromising stability. It features a newly developed NITROFOAM™ midsole with two different densities – a softer core with a firmer rim – and an asymmetrical heel counter to hold the foot in place through every stride. The theme also continues on the outsole, with a wider medial rubber segment that stabilises late-stage pronation. In short, it's the perfect blend of support and cushion.
  • NITRO™: Advanced nitrogen-injected foam designed to provide superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package
  • PWRTAPE: Targeted upper reinforcement for support and durability
  • RUNGUIDE: Firm density guide rail designed to keep your foot aligned and centred through each stride
  • PUMAGRIP: Durable performance rubber compound designed for all-surface traction
  • Engineered mesh upper
  • Moulded heel technology
  • Flared rubber outsole

descripcion: Back in 1987, the OG PUMA Slipstream Lo entered the scene as a basketball sneaker. A high-flying, slam-dunking, statement-making basketball sneaker. Now, it’s joined by Slipstream – a rework of the original that brings an all-new energy to the game while staying true to the OG’s sporting roots. This pair has a trick up its sleeve. Take it into outside and watch details uncover in the UV light.

Science and sportswear converge with the Extotek NITRO™. Built using the precise engineering in our performance running line, these sneakers explore visible functionality and futurism through a pure tech-aesthetic. We’ve kitted out the shoes with a base mesh upper with reflective hits and an anodized TPU cage on the midsole.

MB.02—the hit shoe in LaMelo Ball’s otherworldly PUMA Hoops lineup—doesn’t miss. Driven by the NITRO™ foam infused midsole that mimics Melo’s signature wings, the MB.02 is an undeniable icon. The Fade colorway adds a two-tone pattern that really pops off the court. Plus, that instantly recognizable “1 of 1” branding reiterates that nothing else even comes close.
modelo: PUMA x LAMELO BALL MB.02 Fade Infants' Shoes

descripcion: Inspired by our original PUMA California, the classic lines and dreamy details of the Cali Dream make it ready for all city looks – even if you’re not in The Golden State.

Introducing the Slipstream Lo Retro from PUMA. Released as a competitive basketball shoe in 1987, then reissued in the 2000s with crazy colorways, the iconic Slipstream Lo has made its mark at all important moments of sneaker history. It's being reimagined and updated for the sneaker lovers of today, while staying true to its basketball heritage. These Slipstream Lo Retro Sneakers come with a plush leather upper, suede overlays and retro color pops for a classic look and attitude that lasts.

Through our players and teams, we shine a light on the brilliance of the women's game and create new soccer opportunities for women and girls around the world. ULTRA - Not even you knew you could be this fast. Turn seconds into records with the ULTRA ULTIMATE women's soccer cleat. Lighter means quicker, so the ULTRAWEAVE upper material makes every gram and every second count. Built on a women's last, the dual-density SPEEDPLATE tooling is inspired by PUMA’s track running heritage (fast), made of high-performance PEBA material (light), and optimized for direct-speed stability and propulsion (sweet). At least 20% of the upper is made of recycled materials. Ultra-light. Ultra-fast. ULTRA ULTIMATE.
modelo: ULTRA ULTIMATE Brillance FG/AG Women's Soccer Cleats

descripcion: The Suede hit the scene in 1968 and has been changing the game ever since. It’s been worn by the icons of every generation and it’s stayed classic through it all. This year, we relaunch the Suede with fresh colorways and subtle design updates for the next generation of icons. Classic as ever.

Calling all PR-chasers. Set a new personal best at your next marathon in the Deviate NITRO Elite 2 racing shoes. Pinnacle responsiveness, propulsion, and cushioning in an extremely lightweight package (60g lighter than our previous Deviate model), this shoe exceeds the demands of runners chasing a best time in competitions. We’ve accomplished this through a thinner rubber, an even lighter nitrogen-injected NITRO Elite foam midsole, a leaner and stronger, thermo-formed carbon fibre plate, and a filmy upper that maximizes both breathability and lockdown. Now, take your mark.
modelo: Deviate NITRO™ Elite 2 Women's Running Shoes

Featuring a lightweight construction for all-day comfort, this progressive pair will let your little ones stand out in style.

The FUTURE is back, and so are the back-heels, stepovers and no-look passes. Inspired by Neymar Jr.’s playing style, the reengineered mid-cut construction combines fit and agility so you can create without constraints throughout the 90 minutes. Free to move. Free to play. Free to create.

The upper is textured with different levels of grip for dribbling, passing, and finishing, so you can make every play count.

  • Grippy outsole
  • PUMA branding on tongue, quarter and heel
  • PUMA Formstrip on medial and lateral sides
modelo: Suede Classic Starry Night Little Kids' Sneakers

descripcion:
Back in 1987, the OG PUMA Slipstream Lo entered the scene as a basketball sneaker. A high-flying, slam-dunking, statement-making basketball sneaker. Now, it’s joined by Slipstream – a rework of the original that brings an all-new energy to the game while staying true to the OG’s sporting roots. The Mix Match version dons some playful prints for fun-loving kids.

  • Synthetic and leather base and upper
  • TPU window on lateral and medial side
  • Mesh sockliner
  • Rubber midsole
  • Rubber outsole
  • Elastics and hook-and-loop closure
  • PUMA Toddlers: Recommended for toddlers between 0 and 4 years – for infant styles

From the 100m to a 10K, from hurdles to high jump – whatever your sport, these spikes are great all-rounders. With a calibrated spike arrangement and lightweight cushioning, they're designed to turbocharge your track and field performance.
  • Semi-knitted upper
  • Full-length Pebax plates
  • Full-length CMEVA midsole
  • 6mm replaceable pyramid spike pins
  • PUMA Formstrip on the lateral and medial sides
  • Recommended for older kids between 8 and 16 years
modelo: evoSPEED Star 8 Big Kids' Track Spikes

descripcion: The Suede hit the scene in 1968 and has been changing the game ever since. It’s been worn by the icons of every generation and it’s stayed classic through it all. This year, we relaunch the Suede with fresh colorways and subtle design updates. Classic as ever.

Back in 1980, the Fast Rider was one of PUMA’s most comfortable yet simplistic running shoes, with a super-light design and shock-absorbing outsole. Today, we’ve revamped the Fast Rider as the Future Rider – reborn for casual-cool street style with bold material play and colorblocking, a slimmer outsole, and ultra-comfortable Rider Foam. Play on.
modelo: Future Rider Play On Little Kids' Shoes

descripcion: Playmakers, get ready to Drive Them Crazy with the FUTURE 1.4 – the boot for the most creative player on the field. With an adaptive FUZIONFIT+ compression band across the foot that provides the ultimate in fit and support – even when the boot is worn without laces – and a lightweight firm ground sole plate, you have all you need to run the game your way.
The bold, trailblazing look of the TRC Blaze meets BMW M Motorsport style in this track-ready motorsport shoe.
modelo: BMW M Motorsport TRC Blaze Assembly Motorsport Sneakers

descripcion:
Rider FV is all about a combination of past and future, with a nostalgic, heritage-inspired base and fresh tooling. Mix and match your style with this fun new concept for kids. Designs are all about self-expression and celebrating differences, with playful graphics and hand-drawn elements.

  • Ripstop nylon base
  • Suede and synthetic overlays
  • Laces and hook-and-loop closure
  • EVA midsole
  • Rubber outsole
modelo: Rider FV Mix Match Toddlers' Sneakers

descripcion:
We teamed up with after-school favorite TV series Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir to create the all-new PUMA x MIRACULOUS collection. This version of the RS-X sneaker is directly inspired by the show's main character, Ladybug, with a statement polka dot pattern all over the upper.
  • Low boot
  • Mesh textile upper
  • Polka dot print on synthetic leather overlays
  • 3D Kurim-printed Formstrip
  • Rubber outsole
  • PUMA x MIRACULOUS co-branding
  • PUMA Little Kids style: Recommended for young kids between 4 and 8 years
modelo: PUMA x MIRACULOUS RS-X Little Kids' Sneakers

descripcion: Introducing our first hiking-specific shoe: the Explore NITRO GORE-TEX. It's designed for all trails, from flat and gravelly to steep and rocky, with a combination of NITRO foam and PROFOAMLITE through the midsole maximizing comfort over any terrain. Throw in a PUMAGRIP ATR outsole and a unique collar shape – complete with integrated, heel supporting lacing system – and you have your next trail companion. This pair also has a waterproof GORE-TEX upper to keep you exploring the trails in all conditions.
modelo: SESONS Explore NITRO™ GORE-TEX Women's Hiking Shoes

descripcion: The Porsche Design PWRPlate sneaker is inspired by the carbon chassis integral to Porsche's supercars. The engineered look incorporates a carbon fibre PWRPLATE embedded in the sole.
modelo: Porsche Design PWRPlate Motorsport Men's Sneakers

descripcion:
Fusing the basketball lifestyle with on-court performance, the Court Rider Chaos helps you make the most of your game on the hardwood, while repping a style that's perfect for life off the court.

  • PROFOAM: Lightweight EVA designed to cushion your landing and propel your next step
  • Low boot
  • Mesh upper
  • TPU midsole
  • Rubber outsole
modelo: Court Rider Chaos Fresh Men's Basketball Shoes

descripcion: Product runs in men's sizes. Women's sizes are converted from men's sizes.

The Roma is the stuff of PUMA Archive legend with its sport-turned-street style. The original, which debuted in 1968, was geared for sprints, hurdles, and sweatbands with its padded nylon-suede styling and knack for collecting medals. It's reissued here, in all its glory (less the tube socks) and is fully equipped with a padded tongue and arch support. Done in a durable allover synthetic leather, this one is sized down for young legends-in-the-making.

Inspired by PUMA’s 2000s running range, the Teveris NITRO™ draws on performance aesthetics to create everyday footwear with a sporty edge. The original is reimagined with synthetic leather overlays plus debossed and printed details for sneakers that make a statement with every step, while NITRO™ technology ensures enhanced comfort.
  • NITRO™: Advanced nitrogen-injected foam designed to provide superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package
  • OPTIFIT: Adaptive fit system designed to offer a secure lockdown and support during exercise
  • PROFOAMLITE: Extremely lightweight EVA designed to cushion your landing and propel each step
  • PUMAGRIP: Durable performance rubber compound designed for all-surface traction
  • Synthetic leather base with micro perforation
  • Synthetic leather overlays on vamp, heel and quarter panel
  • Suede tongue, quarter panel underlays, and heel cap
  • CMEVA midsole
  • Rubber outsole
  • Synthetic leather PUMA Formstrip with debossed and printed details
  • Synthetic leather tongue label with debossed, foil-printed PUMA Cat Logo
The Kosmo Rider sneakers have a technical look that brings together the real life and the digital life. It's a bold extension of the Rider family that's all about playful expression.

The perfect choice for young runners, the Electrify NITRO™ 3 running shoe offers a progressive design, delivering cushioning and reliability for your daily jog. In a redesign of the previous models, this dual midsole has more NITROFOAM™ in the heel and durable PROFOAMLITE throughout the rest of the midsole. The result is better responsiveness and ride under the foot, for a shoe that's always airy and cushioned. We’ve revamped the breathable mesh upper with a futuristic look and retooled the rest of the shoe with a rolled collar and a heel that will hug your foot.
  • NITRO™: Advanced nitrogen-infused foam designed to provide superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package
  • PROFOAMLITE: Extremely lightweight EVA designed to cushion your landing and propel each step
  • PUMAGRIP: Durable performance rubber compound designed for all-surface traction
  • Engineered mesh upper
  • TPU heel spoiler
  • Heel fit: rolled collar to keep the heel secure and comfortable
  • Cushioning level: Medium
  • PUMA Formstrip on the lateral side
  • Heel-to-toe drop: 8mm
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral

Inspired by our original PUMA California, the classic lines and dreamy details of the Cali Dream make it ready for all city looks – even if you’re not in The Golden State. The Starry Night pair has glitter details that are right at home in the spotlight.
  • Synthetic leather upper
  • Lace closure for a snug fit
  • Slightly elevated and textured platform sole
  • PUMA Archive No.1 Label on tongue
  • PUMA Archive No.1 Label on tongue
  • PUMA Formstrip on medial and lateral sides
  • PUMA Cat Logo on heel
  • Recommended for young kids between 4 and 8 years
modelo: Cali Dream Starry Night Little Kids' Sneakers

descripcion: These sneakers make every day a vacay! They use metallics and bold splashes of color to create a look that’s fresh and fun, but they also have a serious side. Like many of the shoes in our Rider line, they feature our ‘Federbein’ outsole – perfect for little ones finding their feet.
modelo: Rider FV Vacay Queen Toddler's Shoes

Meet the Thrifted Pack. Inspired by thrift shop fashion, these footwear styles feature light cracked leathers, premium materials, and yellow midsoles for a faded, vintage feel. So pop 'em on, pair with your favorite flea market finds, and rock the retro look hard.

An all-in-one neutral running shoe for any distance, now engineered for a wider foot, the Velocity NITRO 2 Wide is a lightweight and sleek update to the Run PUMA roster. Featuring NITRO foam for exceptional responsiveness and ultimate cushioning, this upgrade to the original is a well-fitting and durable shoe for a smooth ride. PUMAGRIP offers multi-surface traction, from treadmill to track.
modelo: Velocity NITRO™ 2 Wide Men's Running Shoes

descripcion: From the PUMA archives in 1968, this once lightweight training shoe has been redesigned and equipped with comfort enhancing features such as a thick padded tongue and orthopedic arch supports to create the incomparable Roma. The Roma Country features a classic PUMA King fútbol stitch with a corresponding country designed tongue tab. For the real fans.

The animal kingdom is the inspiration for this fun take on the iconic Suede. With paw-shaped straps across the front, these sneakers will have your kids looking cute as can be. Plus the updated midsole is extra comfy, to support your little one from their very first steps.
modelo: Suede Classic Cat Mates Toddler' Shoes

descripcion: Unleash unlimited potential in the power and performance of our Ultra collection. Our Ultra Match Cleats are impeccably engineered to give you a leg up on the competition, featuring our unique GRIP CONTROL enhanced upper for improved ball control, a TPU SPEEDPLATE for incredible traction, control, and propulsion, and an optimal fit enhanced by a knitted low-cut collar. Suitable for firm or artificial ground.
modelo: Ultra Match FG/AG Women's Soccer Cleats

descripcion: Come with us to Smurf Village! PUMA x THE SMURFS takes you right into the world of the little blue creatures. Here, our classic PUMA Suede gets reworked with some Smurfs energy and features Azrael, Gargamel's cat.
modelo: PUMA x THE SMURFS Suede Men's Sneakers

It's reissued here, in all its glory (less the tube socks) and is fully equipped with a padded tongue and arch support.
